description.narrative: The project is a regional endeavor to strengthen the capabilities of Paraguay?s civil organizations. It contains transfer of know-how and competencies of Argentinean civil organizations to Paraguay in order to increase cooperation of Paraguayan civil organ izations with international actors through enhancing their capabilities and skills. It includes exchange of information, courses and training, as well as founding of a new department inside RACI to promote the establishment of a civil organization network similar to RACI to Paraguay. The project tackles the problem of incoherence and lack of knowledge of international cooperation inside the Paraguayan civil organization field. Paraguay is also corrupted country that further hinders the availability of inter national cooperation for Paraguayan civil organizations. The aim of the project is to increase the capabilities and enhance the skills of the organizations as well as bring them together with international actors by disseminating information between them. As mentioned, the long term purpose is to found a similar kind of network of civil organizations to Paraguay as RACI, PRACI (Paraguay en Red ante la Cooperacion Internacional), to promote the development of Paraguayan civil society. This project also serve s the needs of the embassy by providing important information of the Paraguayan civil organization field and eligible new partners concerning the future projects calls and diminishing the possibility of misuse of funds. The project beneficiaries are both A rgentinean and Paraguayan civil organizations.
